subject: RE: [junit] Parameterized test case pattern
msgSnippet: The noarg constructor was introduced so people wouldn t have to always implement the tedious one-arg constructor in every TestCase subclass. While implementing
messageBody:
The noarg constructor was introduced so people wouldn't have to always
implement the tedious one-arg constructor in every TestCase subclass. While
implementing it, we discovered that some VMs crash if you invoke
getMethod(null,null), hence the assertion check. I have added a descriptive
error message to the assertion to avoid problems like the one Elliotte
described.

Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute
